snippet: Three major investigations were underway into the Koran burning at Bagram Air Base by the American military last week.

byline.original: By ALISSA J. RUBIN and GRAHAM BOWLEY
byline.contributor: An employee of The New York Times contributed reporting from Helmand Province.

lead_paragraph: Three major investigations were underway into the Koran burning at Bagram Air Base by the American military last week.

headline.seo: Koran Burning in Afghanistan Prompts 3 Parallel Inquiries
headline.main: Koran Burning in Afghanistan Prompts 3 Parallel Inquiries
headline.print_headline: Koran Burning in Afghanistan Prompts 3 Parallel Inquiries
